entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
